import React from 'react' import { Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import avatar from '../../images/avatar.png' import add from '../../images/add.png' import Multiselect from 'multiselect-react-dropdown'; const AdminAddProducts = () => { const onSelect = () => { } const onRemove = () => { } const options = [ { name: "التصنيف الاول", id: 1 }, { name: "التصنيف الثاني", id: 2 }, ]; return (
